name: 밀소주
image_prompt: Here are the secret recipe. Take a realistic picture of the milsoju made according to this recipe: 1) wash the wheat thoroughly and steam it down. 2) Grind the steamed wheat and 5 dung of yeast together and put it in a jar, pour 1 dong of cold water, and stir it evenly to make alcohol. 3) After about 5 days, pick up soju.
original: 眞麥一斗洗煇蒸，好麴五升合搗納瓮，冷水一盆注下攪之，第五日燒取酒。四鐥極猛。
translated: 1) 밀 1말을 깨끗이 씻어 물러지게 찐다. 2) 찐 밀과 누룩 5되를 같이 찧어서 항아리에 담고 냉수 1동이를 부어 골고루 저어 술을 빚는다. 3) 5일정도 지난 후 소주를 고아낸다.
